article_title: Jeff Glendening: Study’s predictions not coming true elsewhere
article_text:
Medicaid expansion costs unpredictable

Costs higher than predicted in other states

Foolish for Kansas to expand

article_metadata.title: Jeff Glendening: Study’s predictions not coming true elsewhere | The Wichita Eagle

og.description: The Eagle reported on a study that concluded it would be financially beneficial for Kansas to adopt Obamacare’s Medicaid expansion. Though at face value the influx of federal dollars may seem to provide a boost, the facts remain – as other states have shown – that state costs are completely unpredictable and state taxpayers will be left holding the bag.
